LanguageData.XFMParmor_MechanicalArmorCore_Red.label: mechframe core: falcon
>When standing still and not currently melee attacking, search for enemies within 20 tiles radius. >If avaliable target is found, automatically move in and attack. >When melee attacking or approaching target, use charged assault when possible. >When harmed by ranged attack, automatically use active reflection if avaliable.
Generates a force field around the mechframe that reflects bullets back to their shooters for the duration of activation.
Zips betweed adjacent enemies and attack them with lightning speed slashes. The cool down decreases as the blades' attack speed increases.
LanguageData.XFMParmor_PawnJumper_RedSkill.label: flying
LanguageData.XFMParmor_PawnSweeper.label: sweeper
LanguageData.XFMParmor_Weapon_Red.label: plasma dual blade
LanguageData.XFMParmor_Weapon_Red.description: Gigantic swords intended only for mechframes. The dual blades gain power from attacks, speeding up their attack speed.
